system.requirements:
Tier 3; Rank 2 in Medicae Skill
Aptitudes: Intelligence, Fieldcraft
system.effect: Character gains +20 to all Medicae Skill Tests. When providing First Aid, they ignore penalties for Heavily Damaged patients, and only suffer a -10 penalty for those suffering Critical Damage.

description.value: Character gains +20 to all Medicae Skill Tests. When providing First Aid, they ignore penalties for Heavily Damaged patients, and only suffer a -10 penalty for those suffering Critical Damage.
